FuncDef: This command enables the Assisted Replication (AR) function for VXLAN tunnels in the service. The execution of this command triggers the BGP EVPN to send an update containing the inclusive multicast route for the service and the AR type=AR Replicator (AR-R) or AR Leaf (AR-L).

ParaDef.Info: Optional parameter that can be added to the leaf parameter. It specifies the wait time before the leaf can begin sending traffic to a new replicator and is used to allow some time for the replicator to learn about the leaf. Values-1 to 255. ParamDefault: Default- 0 seconds (indicates no replicator-activation-time and no delay in sending packets to the AR-R)
Selects the AR role of the router for the service.
